title: Bard Story Theory

embed.description: When Runeterra's sacred treasures are misused, the Wandering Caretaker intervenes.

body:
So...after watching the video, I think that stone was the "moonstone" (the stone that nami is looking for) and the tribe that use to protect it was the lunari that cease to exist.

Maybe each stone, represented the sun, the moon and the stars? And the tribe was something bigger than the lunari/solari.

Whats your theory?
